description: Smartwool updated the Men's Merino 250 Base Layers Bottom to bring you a better fitting, more functional tight. The technical benefits of 100% Merino wool will help you keep your game at a high level for longer. AndSmartwool's heaviest weight wool fabric will help keep you warm and comfortable as you ski, run, and hike the day away.
name: Smartwool Merino 250 Base Layer Bottoms - Mens
